definition: to walk (side part of split character)
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
Siddhartha Gautama (563-485 BC), the historical Buddha and founder of Buddhism/Sakyamuni Buddha (Sanskrit: sage of the Sakya)
Sakya (name of a north Indian tribe)/abbr. for 釋迦牟尼|释迦牟尼 Sakyamuni Buddha/sugar apple
Sa'gya town and county, Tibetan: Sa skya, in Shigatse prefecture, central Tibet/saga (i.e. heroic tale)
Sa'gya county, Tibetan: Sa skya rdzong, in Shigatse prefecture, Tibet
First epistle of St Paul to the Thessalonians
pinyin: Tie3 sa1 luo2 ni2 jia1 qian2 shu1

definition: Second epistle of St Paul to the Thessalonians
pinyin: Tie3 sa1 luo2 ni2 jia1 hou4 shu1

definition: see 餘甘子|余甘子[yu2 gan1 zi3]
Lanka (old term for Sri Lanka, Ceylon)

sentences.english: And the sons of Micah were， Pithon， and Melech， and Tarea， and Ahaz.
sentences.chinese: 米迦的儿子是毗敦，米勒，他利亚，亚哈斯。

sentences.english: Jarod yanked his mount aside just in time to avoid an agonizing death.
sentences.chinese: 迦洛德猛拉他坐骑跑到一边才免于痛苦的死去。

sentences.english: 21They went to Capernaum, and when the Sabbath came, Jesus went into the synagogue and began to teach.
sentences.chinese: 到了迦百家，耶稣就在安息日进了会堂教训人。

sentences.english: Today Bandhavgarh claims to maintain the highest density of tigers in the country.
sentences.chinese: 如今，班达迦据称保持着国内最高的老虎密度。

sentences.english: Some time after their arrival Jesus went to a wedding at Cana.
sentences.chinese: 他们来到不久耶稣就去参加迦拿的婚筵。

sentences.english: And by the border of Zebulun, from the east side unto the west side, Gad a portion.
sentences.chinese: 挨着西布伦的地界，从东到西，是迦得的一分。

sentences.english: For example, at the wedding in Cana he kept a young couple from being embarrassed.
sentences.chinese: 比如，在迦拿的婚礼上，他让一对年轻夫妇脱离窘境。

sentences.english: Gebal, Ammon and Amalek, Philistia, with the people of Tyre.
sentences.chinese: 迦巴勒，亚扪，和亚玛力，非利士，并推罗的居民。

sentences.english: Perhaps while Jesus was in Cana he received word that John the Baptist had been arrested.
sentences.chinese: 也许耶稣还在迦拿的时候就听到施洗约翰被捕的消息。

sentences.english: And all the brethren who are with me, to the churches of Galatia.
sentences.chinese: 我和同我在一起的众弟兄，致书给迦拉达众教会。

sentences.english: The sons of Uzziel: Micah the first and Isshiah the second.
sentences.chinese: 乌薛的长子是米迦，次子是耶西雅。

sentences.english: We're in the hands of the naga now.
sentences.chinese: 我们落在娜迦的手里了。

sentences.english: And they passed thence unto mount Ephraim, and came unto the house of Micah.
sentences.chinese: 他们从那里往以法莲山地去，来到米迦的住宅。

sentences.english: The sons of Micah: Pithon, Melech, Tarea and Ahaz.
sentences.chinese: 米迦的儿子是毗敦，米勒，他利亚，亚哈斯。

sentences.english: I Hate Sally play the end of "Iscah's Life".
sentences.chinese: 我恨萨利发挥亦迦的生命结束。

sentences.english: And there was a man of mount Ephraim, whose name was Micah.
sentences.chinese: 以法莲山地有一个人名叫米迦。

definition: traditionally used as phonetic for ga/also pr. [ga1]/also pr. [qie2]
used for the sound "zha" in certain names
(appears as phonetic ho, especially in words taken from Sanskrit)/half-blind (archaic)
abbr. for 梵教[Fan4 jiao4] Brahmanism/abbr. for Sanskrit 梵語|梵语[Fan4 yu3] or 梵文[Fan4 wen2]/abbr. for 梵蒂岡|梵蒂冈[Fan4 di4 gang1], the Vatican
see 莎草[suo1 cao3]/see 摩莎[mo2 suo1]
